summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 41, Bell & Denny's Addition, being the alley between 1st Avenue and 2nd Avenue, from Blanchard Street to Bell Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 10511 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
